scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');['index.html','pricing.html','reservation.html','directions.html','faq.html','floor-guide.html','privacy.html','terms.html','404.html','offline.html','manifest.json','sitemap.xml','robots.txt','llms.txt','sw.js','google17dbe9a80407755e.html'].forEach(f=>{try{fs.copyFileSync(f,'dist/'+f)}catch(e){}});['css','js','images','treatments','doctors','bdx','column','video','cases','notice','auth','admin','area','faq'].forEach(d=>{try{cp.execSync('mkdir -p dist/'+d+' && cp -rT '+d+' dist/'+d)}catch(e){}});console.log('Static files synced to dist')"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name seoul-bd-dental
